descriptionHtml:
Chinese 9ring Broadsword





1.         this meshes replace the  scimitar









2.         coc qasmoke                  to  get  the  9ring(scimitar)      







3.        dragon and tiger           Blade           I make  more detail  ....  and    sound!!





  
4.      the 9ring sound   replace   all  sounds of onehandblade   






5.      if you want to delete 9ring sound :   go to (Data\\sound\\fx\\wpn\\)   find   blade1hand  and swing   , delete it , ok!
author: cello
